alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 9:15PM MST until December 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible on the benches. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Periodic road snow and slush will create slick roads, especially during the overnight and early morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
